document.ModsDocTitle: Diversity of mantids (Dictyoptera: Mantodea) of Sangha-Mbaere Region, Central African Republic, with some ecological data and DNA barcoding
document.docAuthor: Moulin, Nicolas, Decaens, Thibaud & Annoyer, Philippe
document.masterDocTitle: Diversity of mantids (Dictyoptera: Mantodea) of Sangha-Mbaere Region, Central African Republic, with some ecological data and DNA barcoding

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Diversity of mantids (Dictyoptera: Mantodea) of Sangha-Mbaere Region, Central African Republic, with some ecological data and DNA barcoding

mods:name.mods:affiliation: 82, route de l'ecole, Hameau de Saveaumare, 76680 Monterolier, France.
Centre d'Ecologie Fonctionnelle et Evolutive, UMR 5175, CNRS, Universite de Montpellier, 1919 Route de Mende, 34293 Montpellier Cedex 5, France.
Insectes du Monde Sabine, 09230 Sainte Croix de Volvestre, France.

subSubSection.paragraph: Roy 1963. Mem. Inst. fond. Afr. noire 66: 183.

CAR, Dzanga-Sangha Special Reserve, between Bayanga and Lidjombo, PK21, UV trap 15-16.VI.1998 (2♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Lidjombo, platform on the canopy 35m, "Limba" Terminalia superba , Combretaceae , UV trap 09.II.2005 (♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Bayanga, base camp, tent, night capture 21.X.2008 (♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Bayanga, platform on the canopy 44m, "Kungu"
Piptadenastrium africanum
, Fabaceae , UV trap 23.X.2008 (2♂) (Collector PA) (IDM and RCNM); Bayanga, base camp, tent, night capture 24.X.2008 (♂) (Collector PA) (IDM); Dzanga-Ndoki National Park, Molongo, Sangha river bank, UV trap 14.XI.2010 (3♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Lake 1, base camp, UV trap 26.XI.2010 (3♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Lake 7, UV trap 28.XI.2010 (3♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Lake 1, platform on the canopy 45m, "Azobe" ,
Lophira alata
, Ochnaceae , UV trap 29.XI-01.XII.2010 (2♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Lake 1, base camp, UV trap 30.XI-01-XII.2010 (2♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Lake 1, base camp, laboratory tent, night capture 02.XII.2010 (2♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Dzanga-Sangha Special Reserve, Bayanga, WWF guest house, night capture 21.I.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Dzanga-Ndoki National Park, M'Boki , Sangha river bank, UV trap 25.I.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM); Lake 1, base camp, leaf, day capture 01.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, UV trap 07-10.II.2012 (3♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, laboratory tent, night capture 11.II.2012 (2♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, platform on the canopy 38m, "Azobe" ,
Lophira alata
, Ochnaceae , UV trap 12.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, UV trap 12.II.2012 (3♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, laboratory tent, night capture 13-14.II.2012 (2♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 3, UV trap 15.II.2012 (♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, laboratory tent, Genitalia Moulin NM0083 (1♂), barcoding BOLD NMMAN11-410 (1♂), Genitalia Moulin NM0073 (1♂), night capture 17-22.II.2012 (5♂) (Collector NM and PA) (IDM and RCNM); Lake 1, platform on the canopy 45m, "Ayous"
Triplochiton scleroxylon
, Sterculariaceae , barcoding BOLD NMMAN11-450 (1♂), UV trap 24.II.2012 (2♂) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM); Lake 1, base camp, UV trap 25.II.2012 (♀) (Collector NM and PA) (RCNM).
CAR, Congo, Democratic Republic of the Congo, Gabon, Ghana, Guinea, Ivory Coast.
